sense.def:
Ever
pomeni ob kateremkoli času v preteklosti.

seg.quote: I don't think I'll ever be homesick here.
I am happier than I have ever been.

sense.def:
Ever
uporabljamo v izrazih kot sta
ever-increasing
ali
ever-present
, da povemo, da nekaj obstaja ali se nadaljuje ves čas.

Besedo
ever
uporabljamo tudi v vprašanjih, ki se začenjajo z besedamo kot so
why
,
when
, in
which
, kadar želimo poudariti svoje presenečenje ali osuplost.

seg.quote: ‘I'm sorry. I'd rather not say.’—‘Why ever not?.’
Who ever would have thought that?

sense.def:
Z izrazom
ever since
poudarimo, da je nekaj že vseskozi od časa, o katerem govorimo, in je še zdaj res.

seg.quote: ‘How long have you lived here?’—‘Ever since I was married.’

sense.def:
Z izrazoma
ever so
in
ever such
poudarimo stopnjo nečesa;

seg.quote: I had ever such a nice letter from her.
